feed.title: DAVx⁵ Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for DAVx⁵: v4.4.2-ose
entry.content:
What's Changed

New features

  • [UI] Show push support status in collection details by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/961

Bug fixes

  • Fix: Syncer synchronizes only once by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/910
  • Create interface for startup plugins by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/915
  • Debug info: Sync interval "0 min" when actually -1 (manual) by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/928
  • Tests: don't create account as long as Hilt is not ready by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/939
  • WebDAV mounts: fix quota view by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/945

Refactoring

  • Replace Apache Commons by native calls/Guava by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/883
  • Use proper DI for Syncer implementations by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/889
  • Replaced "Create" by "Add" when creating accounts by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/892
  • Remove address books sync authority and content provider by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/877
  • Provide collection to SyncManager by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/881
  • Refactor logging by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/906
  • Get rid of Apache Commons by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/901
  • Use DI for AccountSettings and Android tests by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/911
  • Update dnsjava, use desugaring with nio, refactor DNS resolving by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/917
  • WebDAV cache: re-factor using Guava and Hilt by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/921
  • Re-factor Notifications and various Utils to DI by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/924
  • SyncWorker: use Provider for lazy injection by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/925
  • DB: some missing indices by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/890
  • [DI] Use @Inject lateinit var for abstract classes by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/929
  • Remove obsolete Logger object by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/930
  • Use AccountRepository to get list of accounts by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/938
  • Simplify InitCalendarProviderRule by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/940
  • Generalize syncer by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/907
  • SyncManager: pass collection directly by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/927

Dependencies

  • Bump dnsjava:dnsjava from 3.5.3 to 3.6.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/933
  • Update ical4android, specify ical4j log level by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/946

Other changes

  • Tasks screen: adapt padding and text by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/898
  • Backport minor changes from non-ose by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/941
  • Update dav4jvm for better logging by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/956
  • Suppress dnsjava warning because of missing Context by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/959

New Contributors

  • @dependabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/933

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/compare/v4.4.1-ose...v4.4.2-ose

entry.title: New release for DAVx⁵: v4.4.3.2-ose
entry.content:
What's Changed

Bug fixes

  • LocalAddressBook: move contacts when renaming the address book account by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1084

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/compare/v4.4.3.1-ose...v4.4.3.2-ose

entry.title: New release for DAVx⁵: v4.4.4-ose
entry.content:
What's Changed

New features

  • More compatible processing of multiget responses by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1099
  • [Push] Handle subscription expiration by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1131
  • Enforced edge-to-edge by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1078

Bug fixes

  • Set contacts provider settings when address books are renamed or update by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1123
  • Set or update read-only flag when address books are renamed by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1124
  • Show sync error notification even with big local resource by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1139

Refactoring

  • LocalAddressBook: rename account to addressbookAccount by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1095
  • Replace android sync framework result class with our own by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1094
  • Move dirty verifier logic to ContactDirtyVerifier by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1122
  • Move local collection management from companion objects to LocalDataStore by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1125
  • Use timezone ID instead of full VTIMEZONE in DB by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1104

Other changes

  • AccountSettingsMigrations: fix comment, require tests by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1116

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/compare/v4.4.3.2-ose...v4.4.4-ose

entry.title: New release for DAVx⁵: v4.4.5-ose
entry.content:
What's Changed

New features

  • [Push] Allow UP distributor selection by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1146

Bug fixes

  • Don't show app intro again after recomposition by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1142
  • AccountSettings: make enable flag for sync intervals explicit by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1156
  • Fixed padding problems with Edge-To-Edge by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1171
  • LocalAddressBookStore: return all address books, including orphaned ones by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1168
  • Address book accounts: bind to accounts (again) by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1184

Refactoring

  • Extract sync framework interaction to separate class by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1137
  • Get rid of Head response cache by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1155
  • Use AutomaticSyncManager to manage periodic workers and sync framework by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1157
  • [Push] Update specification compliance by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1151
  • AccountSettings: one class per migration, tests by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1181

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/compare/v4.4.4-ose...v4.4.5-ose

entry.title: New release for DAVx⁵: v4.4.6-ose
entry.content:
What's Changed

New features

  • Login: trimmed URLs for URI generation by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1202
  • Change warning when Internet is not available by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1255
  • Debug info: print all workers by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1200
  • Show a warning if calendar or contacts storage is deactivated or missing by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1243

Bug fixes

  • Rename account with jtx collection: IllegalArgumentException by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1198
  • Collection list refresh: Don't update fetched homesets by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1222
  • Don't remove port from URI of nextcloud login intent by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1242
  • Fix show only personal setting not updating the view immediately by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1238

Refactoring

  • Simplify TasksAppManager and TasksAppWatcher by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1193
  • AccountSettings: allow to create new instances during migrations by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1195
  • Sync workers: use data type enum instead of specific authority by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1177
  • [Push] Upon notification, only enqueue sync for the respective service type by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1175
  • Use bundleOf and contentValuesOf, if applicable by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1204
  • DB: move migrations to separate files and use DI by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1206
  • Drop address books authority by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1217
  • Remove test account type by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1224
  • Use StringDef to annotate possible service and collection types by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1227
  • Make room entity properties immutable by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1218
  • Use DB StringDefs also in DAOs and methods where they are used by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1252
  • Replaced LocalContext casting with LocalActivity by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1261

Other changes

  • Hide sync entries in system accounts by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1214
  • Update AUTHORS and copyright notices by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1232

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/compare/v4.4.5-ose...v4.4.6-ose
